oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discharge and re-enlistment records for Spencer Samuel Ferguson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This Honorable Discharge document for Spencer S. Ferguson is dated 8 Feb., 1919. It contains a physical description of him and is signed by Major Joseph Wilkinson at Camp Sheridan, Ala. This discharge was issued for the convenience of the army in accordance with Circular 106, W[ar] D[epartment]. Also includes Ferguson's enlistment record as private first class at Hickman County, Tenn. On April 27, 1918. Apparently he re-enlisted in Dec. 1919 at Fort Oglethorpe, Ga.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
